cause.description:
The America’s Promise Alliance is the nation’s largest multi-sector collaborative dedicated to the well-being of children and youth. The Alliance leads the way in forging multi-sector partnerships, bringing together:
* Businesses * Youth-serving organizations * Elected officials * Educators * Faith groups * Funders * Individuals of all ages
Our Alliance Partners dedicate themselves to work jointly for the success of our young people, using the Five Promises framework to shape their efforts and improve the odds for youth. Together, Alliance partners are working on our National Action Strategies to deliver more of the Five Promises to 15 million children in the next five years.
1. Caring Adults
2. Safe Places
3. A Healthy Start
4. Effective Education
5. Opportunities to Help Others
